articles.title: TVS Srichakra Announces INR 1000 Crore Expansion Plan - Motoroids
articles.description: TVS Srichakra announced its planned capital expenditure of Rs.1,000 Crores to ramp up manufacturing at its Madurai and Pantnagar plants. This investment is planned to be made over a three year period.
